mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, HP_RE_NO, HP_NAME, HPCATE_CODE, HPCATE_NAME, C_NO, C_ID, HP_NO, HP_RE_DATE, LIKE_YN, HP_RE_AVG_RATE, RECEIPT_YN FROM (SELECT HR.HP_RE_NO, H.HP_NAME, HR.HPCATE_CODE, HG.HPCATE_NAME, C.C_NO, C.C_ID, HR.HP_NO, HR.HP_RE_DATE, HR.LIKE_YN, HR.HP_RE_AVG_RATE, HR.RECEIPT_YN FROM HPREVIEW HR JOIN CLIENT C ON(HR.C_NO = C.C_NO) JOIN HOSPITAL H ON (HR.HP_NO = H.HP_NO) JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON (HR.HPCATE_CODE = HG.HPCATE_CODE) ORDER BY HR.HP_RE_DATE DESC )

SELECT HR.HP_RE_NO, H.HP_NAME, HL.HPCATE_CODE, HG.HPCATE_NAME, HR.C_NO, C.C_ID, HR.HP_NO, HP_RE_DATE, LIKE_YN, HR.HP_RE_AVG_RATE, HR.HP_RE_DATE, HR.DETAIL_EXPLANATION, HR.STAFF_KIND, HR.WAITING_TIME, HR.TREATMENT_RESULT, HR.CLEANLINESS, HR.PRICE, HR.HP_RE_CONTENT, HR.HPRE_ORIGIN, HR.HPRE_RENAME, HR.RECEIPT_YN FROM HPREVIEW HR JOIN CLIENT C ON (HR.C_NO = C.C_NO) JOIN HOSPITAL H ON (HR.HP_NO = H.HP_NO) JOIN HPLIST HL ON (H.HP_NO = HL.HP_NO) JOIN HPCATEGORY HG ON (HL.HPCATE_CODE = HG.HPCATE_CODE) WHERE HR.HP_RE_NO=#{hpReNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINTSAVE VALUES(SEQ_POINTSAVE.NEXTVAL, 1000, SYSDATE, #{hpReNo}, NULL, NULL, #{cNo})
